headline: Builders FirstSource’s Q4 Earnings Call: Our Top 5 Analyst Questions
summary: Builders FirstSource’s fourth quarter was marked by a sharp decline in sales volumes across its core markets, as the company faced persistent housing affordability challenges and weak consumer confidence. Management pointed to a steeper-than-anticipated drop in homebuilder activity late in the quarter, especially as builders pulled back on new starts to work down inventory. CEO Peter Jackson cited “ongoing housing affordability challenges, weak consumer confidence and depressed commodity prices”
